question: First one day international double century was scored by ‘Sachin Tendulkar’ on which ground of Madhya Pradesh?
explanation: Captain Roop Singh Stadium is a cricket ground in Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh. It was originally a hockey stadium named after great Indian hockey player Roop Singh brother of hockey legend Dhyan Chand.Sachin Tendulkar made the first international double century in this stadium in Feb 2010.
